name: 3D DEATH CHASE CLONE
description:
CW: THIS GAME (unfortunately) has flashing colors that show up every time you crash.

This is the recreation of Death Chase which was created in 1983 by Micromega. This is an assignment for NYU Game Center's Major Studio Class ( Fall 2020).
The original can be played here, but please be advised about the flashing color when you crash.

All the art sprites have been ripped directly from the game and the font used is Vector from Chevy Ray's pixel fonts pack that can be purchased here.


MODERN CONTROLS

W -accelerate
A - steer left
S- decelerate
D - steer right
Space - Fire

ORIGINAL CONTROLS

1 - steer left
0 - steer right
8 - decelerate
9 -accelerate
Space - Fire

* Note: Like the original, you need to be above the base speed in order to shoot so make sure you accelerate twice if you'd like to shoot a projectile.

HOW TO WIN
Survive for 14 rounds. I couldn't do it in the original and I certainly haven't been able to have the patience to do it for this clone. If you can survive through all 14 rounds, I must say I applaud you for doing what I could not.
